title: Coordinate Care with a Specialist
description: A primary care provider's care manager needs to send a referral and relevant patient information to a cardiologist's office.

tasks.description: Create a new referral order for Cardiology for the patient.
tasks.expected_outcome: The care manager initiates the referral in the EHR.

tasks.description: Select the relevant documents from the patient's chart to include with the referral (e.g., recent progress notes, EKG results).
tasks.expected_outcome: The care manager chooses the appropriate clinical information to send.

tasks.description: Send the referral and the attached documents electronically to the specialist's office.
tasks.expected_outcome: The referral is successfully transmitted, allowing the specialist's office to schedule the patient.
